answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
Attached is the City of Virginia Beach's Self-Evaluation form for Performance feedback.  The Member Self Appraisal Form is designed to assist the member in providing input regarding their performance and to assist in obtaining a more comprehensive performance assessment.  Responses to all questions are encouraged but are not required.
It is suggested that the employee respond to the questions in writing and provide to their supervisor in advance of the performance review meeting.
Supervisors are encouraged to review and discuss the employee’s comments during the performance review meeting.
Hope this helps!

author: Tammy Bissette
text: We are currently working on updating our self evaluation tool.  I have attached a sample of our current self evaluation.  We don't get a lot of employee engagement with this form and are hoping to get some ideas for updates.  Are there any areas you would suggest changing?  Or do you have a copy of your own self evaluation you would be willing to share?
title: Employee Self Evaluation
